---
title: TPG Technology Consultants
author: ''
date: '2022-11-16'
slug: tpg_technology_consultants
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $59.4M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with TPG Technology Consultants. The average
  contract duration was 1.67 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $1.0M. The longest
  contract was 7.55 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $41.4M.
lookup_name: 'TPG TECHNOLOGY CONSULTANTS'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '59.4M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '442'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '315'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '71%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '208%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '3.1'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '127.9M'
s424_mean_duration: '1.67'
s421_mean_contract_value: '1.0M'
s425_max_duration: '7.55'
s422_max_contract_value: '41.4M'
---
